name: ALIEN ATTACK (RED BONE GAME STUDIO)
description:
ENGLISH:

The game is based on a planet, named KEOS, which is attacked by aliens.
You must pick up your ship and destroy them all, including the alien mother.

BECOME THE HERO OF THE PLANET!! (You will not last 5 minutes playing this game)

THIS IS AN ARCADE GAME!!

It is a game that requires memorizing patterns, the game starts out easy, but then gets harder and harder.

//**CONTROLS**\\

MOVE: W,A,S,D - UP, DOWN. LEFT, RIGHT

SHOOT:  SPACE, X, M, CLICK

PAUSE: ESCAPE

INTERACT: ENTER

**You can change the keys (IN THE OPTIONS), but once the game is closed, the keys will not be saved**

RED BONE LINKS:

INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/red_bone_game_studio?igshid=1oz47oarccb94
TWITTER: https://mobile.twitter.com/RED_BONE_STUDIO

//#SUPPORT ME TO CONTINUE CREATING OR IMPROVING!!#\\

ESPAÑOL

El juego se basa en un planeta, de nombre KEOS, que es atacada por aliens.
Tu debes recoger tu nave y destruirlos a todos, incluyendo al alien madre.
Convierte en el heroe del planeta!! (No duraras ni 5 minutos jugando este juego)

ESTO ES UN JUEGO ARCADE!!

Es un juego que requiere de memorizar patrones, el juego comienza facil, pero luego se hace cada vez mas dificil

//**CONTROLES**\\

MOVERSE: W,A,S,D - ARRIBA, ABAJO, IZQUIERDA, DERECHA

DISPARAR: X, M, ESPACIO, CLICK

PAUSE: ESCAPE

INTERACTUAR: ENTER

RED BONE LINKS:

INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/red_bone_game_studio?igshid=1oz47oarccb94 TWITTER: https://mobile.twitter.com/RED_BONE_STUDIO

//#APOYAME PARA SEGUIR CREANDO O MEJORANDO!!#\\
